SETUP: : brown_town bids 0 Influence for USSR
Mullets Attack bids 2 Influence for USSR
brown_town will play as USSR.
Mullets Attack will play as USA.
Additional Influence from bidding: US +2

Optional Cards Added
Time per Player: 45 Minutes
